propertyDefinition.name: RbsoLevel1CheckActive
propertyDefinition.description: Indicates whether RBSO Level 1 check is active.

propertyDefinition.name: RbsoLevel1CheckOk
propertyDefinition.description: Indicates whether the RBSO check is Ok.

propertyDefinition.name: RbsoLevel2CheckActive
propertyDefinition.description: Indicates whether RBSO Level 2 check is active.

propertyDefinition.name: RbsoLevel2CheckOk
propertyDefinition.description: Indicates whether the RBSO check is Ok.

propertyDefinition.name: LargeGapIcCurrent
propertyDefinition.description: Value of the Ic Cyclo LG current averaged over 1s.

propertyDefinition.name: BaeuState
propertyDefinition.description: The state of the Bireu: Idle, Ready, BcmCheckStarted, Unknown.
